mapper.insert: insert into event (evt_cd, title, contents, img_full_rt, s_date, e_date, active_s_cd, prize, ad_id, first_id, last_id, group_no) values (#{evt_cd}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{img_full_rt}, #{s_date}, #{e_date}, #{active_s_cd}, #{prize}, #{ad_id}, #{first_id}, #{last_id}, #{group_no});

insert into event(evt_cd, title, contents, img_full_rt, s_date, e_date, active_s_cd, prize, ad_id, first_id, last_id, group_no) values ( #{evt_cd}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{img_full_rt}, #{s_date}, #{e_date}, #{active_s_cd}, #{prize}, #{ad_id}, #{first_id}, #{last_id}, #{group_no});
